description: Feather reed grass (Calamagrostis acutiflora 'Karl Foerster') is a truly stunning ornamental grass. Its bright green foliage is graced with beautiful feather-like plumes that slowly transition from creamy white to bronze and finally to gold. It grows upright until early summer, when the plumes bloom, giving the grass a more horizontal appearance. Its drought-tolerance and deer resistance make it an ideal landscaping choice, while its tall graceful appearance is sure to be a show-stopper in any landscape. Whether planted alone or in combination with other plant species, feather reed grass is a magnificent addition to any garden.
